member.name: T:KeywordUtil.KeywordUtils
member.summary: The static container and version wrapper for methods for working with keyword enums.

member.name: M:KeywordUtil.KeywordUtils.RegisterKeywordBuf``1
member.summary: Registers a subclass in the AddKeywordBuf system. It will be associated with the that is returned by the of an instance created by the parameterless constructor of the given class.
member.typeparam: The subclass to be registered in the AddKeywordBuf system.

member.name: M:KeywordUtil.KeywordUtils.TryGetRegisteredBufType(KeywordBuf,System.Type@)
member.summary: Checks if a given value has been registered for addition in the AddKeywordBuf system. Note: this ONLY checks for registrations via KeywordUtil - not for associations coded in vanilla by default, and not for possible patch-additions done independently of KeywordUtil!
member.param: The value to check for being registered.
member.returns: if has been registered via KeywordUtil, and otherwise.
member.param: When the method returns , contains the subclass associated with ; contains otherwise.

member.name: M:KeywordUtil.KeywordUtils.TryGetAssociatedBufType(KeywordBuf,System.Type@)
member.summary: Checks if a given value has an association for addition in the AddKeywordBuf system. Note: this checks for ANY buf type associations - including those hardcoded in vanilla, those registered via KeywordUtil, and those possibly patched in by other means!
member.param: The value to check for being registered.
member.returns: if has been registered via KeywordUtil, and otherwise.
member.param: When the method returns , contains the subclass associated with ; contains otherwise.

member.name: M:KeywordUtil.KeywordUtils.CreateBufInstance(KeywordBuf)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a buf that would be created through the AddKeywordBuf system (if any).
member.param: The value to try creating the associated buf instance for.
member.returns: A instance of the type that would be created by AddKeywordBuf using , if any would be, and otherwise.
